transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Namaste Mr. Ji, kaise hain aap?
Customer: Theek hoon madam.
Executive: Mr. Ji aapka ye jo ek ticket open hua tha na Maurya fragrance ke naam se. Isse sir maine aapka aage escalate bhi kiya tha. Management se bhi ye aaya tha ki uska to aage process mein kuch ho nahi sakta refund. Aap use kijiye agar thoda time agar aap abhi hold karna chahte hain ek do mahine hold karke fir use kar lena. But refund process to kuch nahi hai.
Customer: Nahi madam aapne bola tha.
Executive: Ab wo sab aapka mujhe nahi pata lekin mujhe use nahi karna mera kaam bhi nahi ho raha.
Executive: Chalo aapke upar hai na sir chalo aapko use nahi bhi karna hai Mr. Ji to theek hai wo aapka call hai. Lekin aap ye samjhiye sir unnecessary ab dekho jo cheez honi hoti hai to sir ab aap use bhi nahi kar rahe ho hamara na koi profit hai na koi nuksan hai. To main hum us cheez ko rakh ke bhi kya karenge. Aapki thodi si cheez ko samjhiye.
Customer: Nahi madam aisa aap ab discuss kar rahe ho na ye sab cheeze maine discuss karke hi payment kiya tha ab aap dusri cheez bol rahe ho to mujhe wo cheez pata nahi maine aapna problem aapko bataya.
Executive: Dusri cheez kya bol rahe hain sir aisa koi dusri aapko humne ye tak bola hai ki sir aapko return mein kuch diya hai kisi ne to aap do hum uske liye action le lenge us person ke liye jisne aapko ye commitment karaya agar.
Customer: Maine to bharosa kiya na aapki baat pe jaise abhi aap bol rahe ho waise tab bhi bharosa kiya maine. Abhi bhi aap return mein to bol nahi rahe ho ki main de paunga.
Executive: Aap agar return mein mere ko do bhaiya tabhi nahi hai.
Customer: Aapne bola bhi nahi na ki aap return mein mere se mango maine abhi tak bola.
Customer: Aapne bola na aapki team member ne to bola na.
Executive: Aisa kuch nahi madam maine rule mein jaanta hoon baki agar aap return mein nahi de rahe ho to theek hai main apne lawyer se puch lunga bhai iska kya process hota hai agar koi company aisa kar rahi hai to.
Executive: Wahi wahi main keh rahi hoon na sir usme aap aap dekho aapko sara PI wala sab kuch approved hai. Aisa to hai nahi ki aapko aisa bola nahi gaya hai kuch nahi gaya. Usme unnecessary sir dekho rakhne wali baat hoti hai aap wo aap agar ab kisi cheez pe sir aap bhi ad rahe hain aap sunne ko hi raazi nahi ho rahe hain to aap hum aapko kya kar sakte hain.
Customer: Nahi madam aap hai na inke sath call pehle Shivam sahab se meri ho chuki hai aisa nahi maine suna hai sun bahut suna aap sab apni baat kahiye maine ki mere ko sirf mera kaam nahi chal raha aur main promotion aage nahi promotion kya kuch usme call to mere paas kabhi aayi nahi jo mujhe karna tha wahi kar raha tha wo bhi main nahi use kar pa raha hoon.
Executive: To wo concern use to karna padta hai sir use bhi kaha se kara aapne aap keh rahe hain teen mahine.
Customer: Aap dekho mahine mahine aap dekho.
Executive: Maine maine use kiya hai usme kitni call mere paas aayi hain aap dekho. Aapko main inquiry chart bheju sir. Aapne pure mahine ka main aapko bata rahi hoon aapka jo mahina start hua tha 16 November se 16 din aapne use kiya tha services.
Customer: Madam maine iske bare mein sab discuss kiya hai pehle bhi mere wo manager hain maine usse pehle hi mere manager badalte rahe hain. Jo bhi manager aate hain aap record check karo sabhi se meri baat hui is bare mein unhone kaha sir call aayegi dheere se aayegi thoda time lagta hai cheh mahine time lagega paanch mahine time lagega. Paanch cheh mahine time lagega ye sab bolte rahe hain wo mere se.
Executive: Haan to sir aap aapke paas mein to humne bola bhi nahi hai aur mera kaam chal nahi raha usse.
Executive: Mr. Sir aap ek baat batao aapne apna jo business khola tha Maurya fragrance kabhi jab bhi khola tha kitna kitna time hua is business ko khole hue aapko. Ek saal do saal.
Customer: Maine madam ji do saal dhai saal teen saal ho gaya hai. Ab dusri cheez kya hai main hum log to apna.
Executive: Sir ek minute sir meri baat khatam nahi hui sun lijiye dhai saal mein aapne kya pehle saal mein hi ummeed rakhi thi ki main jaise hi paisa abhi se dalna shuru karunga to ROI mujhe pehle saal mein hi aa jayega.
Customer: To main IndiaMART ko nahi keh raha hoon ki mera.
Executive: Accha aap log main IndiaMART ko nahi keh raha hoon ki mera promotion nahi ho raha isliye main kar raha hoon. Main keh raha hoon ki mera business abhi aage 10 mahine jayega nahi maine jo 33000 diye hain iska koi utilization nahi hai mere paas. Main ye keh raha hoon. Main nahi keh raha IndiaMART ki koi problem main keh raha hoon ye to mujhe pehle hi unhone pehle din bata diya tha ki itna time lagna hai. Main sirf itna keh raha hoon ki aaj mere abhi nau mahine bakaya hai promotion ke aur mera business abhi ek saal run karne ke year saal nahi ja raha hai mere 33000 bekar jaane wale hain. Maine bas itna kaha hai aur barabar yahi keh raha hoon.
Executive: Theek hai ab main ek cheez aapko sir normal ek baat samjhiye mera. Main aapka point samajh rahi hoon sir aisa nahi hai ki hum log aapka koi aap hamare koi dushman hain hum aapka point samajhne ka chaah hi nahi rahe ya nahi samajhna hai. Hum bhi sir employee hain aapko being a company rules ke regulation ke according suggestion de sakte hain uska solution de sakte hain right. Ab aap mujhe bol rahe ho sir aap khud socho aap koi product market mein aap kisi se kharid ke laate ho aap teen mahina use karne ke baad aur chahe nahi bhi use karte aapke paas rakha hua hai use sell kar diya aap usko thodi na bologe ab iska mera koi use nahi hai tum wapis le jao.
Customer: Madam ye digital services hain aap log kabhi bhi.
Executive: Nahi karte na sir wo cheez. Hai sir hamara service provider ke sath na hamara product plan hai sir ye.
Customer: Madam main bhi IT mein teen saal se kaam kar raha hoon. Main bhi IT mein hi hoon jis field mein aap log ho aap log service provider ho service dete ho agar service ka koi utilization nahi hai to refund ho jaati hain services. Hum log bhi dete hain main IT engineer hoon mere ko pata nahi hai.
Executive: Sir aap sir aap na kam kaha ka cheeze kaha aap kar rahe ho sir. Sir IndiaMART aap ek bar kabhi abhi search karo aapko jab agar aap IT mein ho aapko ye cheez bahut acche se pata hogi sir ye service based industry ke sath product based services bhi hain hamari. Aisa nahi hai ki hum aapko sirf service de rahe hain.
Customer: Aap product sale nahi karte aap product management karte ho aap lead dete ho ye aapka services ke antargat aata hai ki aap logon ko digital services de rahe ho.
Executive: Sir wo product agar aap keh rahe ho service kuch product ki hi to service de rahe hain hum aapko. Aap jo humse buy kar rahe ho leads ka usi ki to service de rahe hain na hum aapko wo maintain kaise rahegi wo aap kitna kya kar rahe ho to sab cheeze na aap.
Customer: Jaise kisi office mein aap jao aapka probation period hota hai teen mahine aapko dekha jaata hai chaar mahine.
Executive: Service fees di jaati hai sir service kis cheez ki di jaati hai.
Customer: Aap dekh lo aapke service maine aisa koi ek profile aapne banaya hai service aap koi service maine abhi li hi nahi kisi tarah ki main to 60 70000 wala leta maine socha tha main monthly lunga. Unhone kaha bhai aap itna mehenga kyun monthly loge. Maine kaha theek hai aap to fir 3000 wala de do.
Executive: Sir ab aapko main ye monthly wala lena chahta tha maan liya aap mujhe keh rahe ho sir ek baat batao aap meri jagah bhi to aake socho being a employee main agar samne kisi ko main kaise aap mujhe batao ki main kisko jaake bolu ye cheez management mein main kya proof dikhau ki aapko aapne aapko agar kisi ne bola to main aapse wahi cheez to bol rahi hoon na sir aap mujhe ye cheez de do return mein main aage forward kar deti hoon main yahi to kar sakti hoon na sir aapke liye.
Customer: Aap accha batao aap jisne mere se interact kiya ho jisne mere ko service di ho sara record aap logon ke paas hoga aap internally kyun nahi check karte aap unse pucho aapne kya bola tha.
Executive: Sir record ek minute sir record mere paas hoga agar maan lo chalo aapki baat maine badi kar di sir main keh rahi hoon aapke jo employee hain jinhone ye services aapko di thi wo agar mujhe bas samne se ye cheez bol dete mam maine aisa koi commitment ya kuch aisa to bola hi nahi ki aapka paisa pura refund ho jayega. To main kaha main kya pakdungi sir aap mujhe batao chalo main aapki baat hi badi kar rahi hoon sir lekin aap mujhe agar cheeze kuch de denge aapka kuch messages hoga kuch kuch to hoga na rakha hua ki aapne services di hai PI approve kara kuch to hoga sir aap do to main bhejne ke liye tayar hoon main mana thodi na kar rahi hoon.
Customer: Mere paas mein sirf invoice hai mere paas to sirf invoice hai unhone kaha tha aapko apne control panel mein aapko return ki aapko dikh jayega jab aap ek bar payment aapka ho jayega aapka profile ban jayega ye mere se kaha tha aur wahi bola tha ki main humne bhi kiya bhi hai last month ye bhi mere se kaha tha.
Executive: Sir ek baat bataiye chalo aapki baat aap ek taraf sir keh rahe hain sir bura mat manna please aap meri samjhiye ko samjh sir main aap hi ki side hoon main aap hi ki cheeze samajhne ke liye aur aage ke liye bhi aapke liye acche ke liye hi bol rahi hoon. Aap IT engineer bol rahe hain aap sab cheeze bol rahe hain aapko itna sari cheeze boli jaati hain kari jaati hain aap bharosa rakh rahe hain that is fine bahut acchi baat hai sir bharosa nibhaya bhi hai aisa nahi hai ki humne aapki koi services band kar di ya aapko kuch galat guide kiya. Aap ye cheez samjhiye sir aapne aankh band karke aapne sirf aapko bola aapko kisi ne chalo ye bola ki aap abhi se kar dijiye aapko matlab ye approve hone ke baad aapko aa jaata hai return mein sab cheeze bola aap kaise sir kisi ko kis cheez pe bharosa karte hain aap mail pe to mango kisi se at least chalo theek hai aisa hota hoga PI bhi aata hoga inke baad PI aata hai wo uske baad payment ke baad hi aata hai lekin usse pehle aapka kuch jo discussion hui hain services ko leke kuch term and condition bhi to mail pe return mein ja sakti hain na wo kyun nahi mangi fir aapne aap ek taraf to sir ye cheez bol rahe hain sir aap main bahut IT engineer hoon padha likha hoon jab cheezon mein cheeze samjho meri meri side bhi aapko.
Customer: Dekho maine aisa nahi tha isiliye main monthly package chaah raha tha ki mera monthly chalega nahi chalega unhone isliye kaha bhai aap ye le lo agar hoga to hum log wapas bhi kar sakte hain aap ye wala package le lo monthly wale mein abhi planning chal raha hai humne monthly isliye jaana chahte the hum jab chahe to band kar de.
Executive: Sir main aapka point bilkul samajh rahi hoon lekin ab ye ab sir ab kya kar sakte hain sir batao ab wo cheez possible nahi hai. Ab aap kya solution mangte ho humse.
Customer: Possible nahi hai nahi hai wo fir dekhta hoon mere calls wagera padi hongi kisne baat kya thi record laga ke baki jo rules hain jo kya hain wo laws kya hain dekh ke fir baat karta hoon.
Executive: Haan wo fir wo kar lo. Usme time thoda zyada lagega.
Customer: Nahi nahi mere ko na aana to fir aapke paas bhi padega na discuss to aapse hi karenge lekin ye theek nahi hai main matlab mere ko to mera kaam chal nahi raha mere ko.
Executive: Sir aapko agar main sari cheeze bol rahi hoon discuss karne wali cheeze bhi bol rahi hoon sab kuch bol rahi hoon to main bhi to sir kisi wajah se bol rahi hoon na aapka dekho mere paas ticket open hai maine aapko call kara aap mera ek kaam karo main aapko apna personally number de deti hoon apne number se ek whatsapp dal deti hoon aap koi bhi record jo nikal rahe ho jahan se check kar rahe ho jo cheez kar rahe ho aap use kar do baki aapki ticket mere paas assigned hai sir wo mere liye hota hai main usko band kar deti hoon yahan se baki aapko jo interaction karna hai aap personally mujhse kar lijiye so that main aage chal ke.
Customer: Nahi nahi aap ticket mat band kariye aap meri ticket mat band kariye bhale hi aaj aap deal kar rahe hain kal aap office chhod ke chale gaye to koi aur aayega wo aap ticket mat close kariye please.
Executive: Sir main main 10 main 10 saalon se hoon but theek hai agar aapko wo rakhna hai aapki ichcha hai sir aap wo dekh lo lekin ye automatically sir band hoga hi hoga main usse kuch nahi kar paungi.
Customer: Nahi automatic kaise hoga aap close mat kariye ticket main iske bare mein customer se baat kar lunga aap abhi ho kya mere manager kai badal chuke hain aaj aap baat kar rahi hain.
Executive: Main aapke manager ki manager hoon aapke manager Shivam lekin ye log update hote rehte hain aaj is aap hi to keh rahi hain kis se aapne baat ki aaj aap baat kar rahe ho koi koi dusra puchega to main kya proof dunga usko isliye madam meri ticket mat close kijiye.
Executive: Bilkul aapko dusra puchega main aapko ye aapka aage escalate karungi higher usme aapko.
Customer: Wahi wahi main keh raha hoon koi aur aayega mere paas kuch proof nahi hai to aap ise close mat kariye aap baki main aapko baat kar lunga.
Executive: Sir ye system mein hain aapke aap ise band karo chahe mat karo aapke Maurya and fragrance ke naam pe ye ticket already chal raha hai theek hai aapko koi aur aaye baat kare se kuch ho wo chalega.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Aapko band bhi ho jayega to bhi feedback purana dikhta hi hai aisa nahi hai ki kaun aaye kisko nahi pata hota sir sabko sab pata hota hai yahan pe.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai to aap close mat kariye baki jo agar koi dusra bhi call mere paas customer se aata hai baat hoti hai to main fir unse hi baat kar lunga baki main number de raha hoon kis se meri baat do teen mahine pehle hui thi is bare mein theek hai main check kar raha hoon.
Executive: Theek hai okay sir okay okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants a refund for the subscription.

- Customer says calls are not coming.

- Customer says business is not running.



Resolution:

- Executive explained company policy on refunds.

- Executive explained about product based services.

- Executive offered personal number for further assistance.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will check call records and legal options.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, buyleads, business
